core_meaning.en: Social disagreements or excessive agreement may cause conversational difficulties, with possible issues or hesitation involving children. Interactions such as meetings, phone calls, or changes may bring discomfort or obstacles.

en: Communication difficulties and social tensions may lessen.

hi: संचार की कठिनाइयाँ और सामाजिक तनाव कम हो सकते हैं।
